prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a segmented body and vibrant colors.
I want a small, caterpillar-like Pokemon that lives in forests and is very friendly.
Generate a cute Pokemon resembling a worm, with spikes and a bright pink hue.
Make a Pokemon that evolves into a beautiful butterfly, starting from a tiny larva.
Imagine a Pokemon that can camouflage in grasslands, blending with its surroundings.
Design a playful insect Pokemon that loves to climb trees and explore nature.
Show me a Pokemon with a round body and cheerful personality, perfect for kids.
